WTF? Text Aloud? That's what TA means is they have Microsoft Sam reading this bloody thing. Not only that but the guy says he's proud of how he put it together. It literally says "D.R.I.Z.Z.T." instead of saying the name it sounds out the letters. Maybe it's better than some but if you wanted to waste that much time why didn't you just read the books yourself and it would be a lot better. There is four of five TA files. Be Warned! You won't be listening to them unless you brought your rewind button and decoder ring to figure out exactly what Microsoft Sam is saying as he spouts words out to fast and not pronounced right.
